description: A simple, empty world, ready for Reeborg to explore.
pre:
think(0)
import random
width = random.randint(4, 14)
height = random.randint(4, 14)

RUR.set_world_size(width, height)
RUR.fill_background("pale_grass")

for x in range(1, width+1):
	for y in range(1, height+1):
		if random.randint(1, 100) > 50:
			numberOfCarrots = random.randint(1,10)
			RUR.add_object("carrot", x, y, {'number': numberOfCarrots})

RUR.add_object("carrot", width, height, {'goal': True, 'number': "all"})
#RUR.add_final_position("flag", 1, 1)

think(500)
